alert.note: Alert for Emmons; Sioux (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 2:15PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHEASTERN SIOUX AND SOUTHWESTERN EMMONS COUNTIES THROUGH 245 PM CDT... At 215 PM CDT, a strong thunderstorm was located 6 miles south of Fort Yates, or 15 miles northeast of Mclaughlin, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Fort Yates around 225 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
